actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to continue the national insurance development program by extending the present termination date of the program to April 30, 1982, and by extending the present date by which a plan for the liquidation and termination of the reinsurance and direct insurance programs is to be submitted to the Congress to April 30, 1985.

summary.text: National Insurance Development Act - Amends the National Housing Act to: (1) extend the termination date of the national insurance development program, so as to maintain the Federal riot insurance program and the Federal crime insurance program, to April 30, 1985; (2) continue reinsurance until April 30, 1985; and (3) extend the date by which the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development must submit to Congress a plan for the liquidation and termination of the reinsurance and direct insurance programs to April 30, 1985.

titles.title: A bill to continue the national insurance development program by extending the present termination date of the program to April 30, 1982, and by extending the present date by which a plan for the liquidation and termination of the reinsurance and direct insurance programs is to be submitted to the Congress to April 30, 1985.
